Reviews.Content: excellent localization 2 min st marco 1 min motorboat easy access airport station price budget travels cold gf cold night heating system heated air bit walls cold central heating system cold breakfast tea coffee honey butter cereals milk bread decent bites city staff nice people

Reviews.Title: “a bargain, great staff”
Reviews.Author: Netski66
Reviews.Content: mum stayed twice past highly recommended exceptional price night double shared bathroom location minutes walk st marks close canal boat stops easy access train station airport little daggy classic venetian florals heavy dark wood furniture staircase hard bed pillows didnt mind building amazing venice till standing ownermanager brother sister charming speak languages happy answer questions guide help theres late night eatery called bacchus nearby excellent emergency panini vino view window onto canal hearing gondoliers singing regular basis highlight romantic amazing firsttime visitor slightly surly late night doorman doesnt favours

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, clean comfortable rooms, nice breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: Whitleys2011
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 2 nights albergo easy minutes stmarks square lot charm stayed romantic canal hear evening passed shared bath decent toliet separate clean beds comfortable breakfast typical italian plentiful seating cute owner tremendous recomendation pizza antica authentic found entire 5 weeks travel cant beat price location

Reviews.Title: “Fine and central”
Reviews.Author: kirmorrison
Reviews.Content: location exploring venice basic fine nice hear gondoliers singing beneath window staff pleasant friendly dont wear socks walking halls bathroom floors pretty slippy managed bit nasty fall pillows hard glad travellers advice bringing own travel pillow breakfast basic cereal roll fine start day nice stay price location

Reviews.Title: “Charming, great location & value for budget travelers”
Reviews.Author: KendallAnne
Reviews.Content: friend kate traveled italy april 2011 chose hotel price location found hotel rick steves italy guide book perfect choice venetian vacation directions website train station easy follow hotel minute walk zaccaria water bus station located near saint marks perfect location exploring venice hotel staff extremely friendly smiling gladly helped atm affordable restaurant recommendations helped plan morning 330 am trip airport third floor charming antique furniture picturesque view venices cute narrow canals evening prime view parade gondolas lovely echos singing gondoliers according players playing tourists shared bathroom floor toilet shower inroom sink bidet bathrooms bit dated clean mentioned towels knowing ahead time bring travel towel robes walk comfortably shower bed hard rock surprisingly comfortable pillows hard luckily brought travel pillows okay tired days sightseeing slept wonderfully floors wooden creaky noise loud bother disrupt sleep breakfast completely adequate offering coffee pastries cereal bread assortment jams butter overall loved hotel value location heartily recommend budget travelers

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly english speaking staffs.”

Reviews.Content: 2 nights summer easy follow map website via alilaguna water bus airport aligned san zaccaria jetty stop san marco 500m found hotel alley 5 mins stayed single shared bathroom canal views looking courtyard sense coz stench canals hot weather mentioned travellers towels adequate 2 nights hot humid theres ceiling fan probably stronger breakfast included basic plain bread roll jams spread cornflakes tea milk coffee location excellent friendly budget hotel venice standard suitable budget conscious couples family

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value for the money”
Reviews.Author: KseniyaG
Reviews.Content: hotel 5minute walk san marko square perfect location shared bathroom caused waits clean spacious included sink easily hear neighbours door downstairs breakfast below average biscuits jam 2 types cereal coffee wasnt value money considering location

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location!”

Reviews.Content: hotel 5 min walk st marks square location perfect canal view nice extra cost fancy shared bathroom bathroom available
